naslov: VODICE, NOVOGRADNJA, PREDIVNA DVOJNA KUĆA S BAZENOM I VRTOM (prodaja)
opis: Prodaje se predivna dvojna kuća s bazenom i prostranim vrtom u Vodicama s atraktivnim pogledom na more. Kuća se nalazi na idealnoj i mirnoj lokaciji, u blizini mora kao i predivnog mjesta Tribunj. Samostalna uporabna cjelina – nalazi se u suterenu, prizemlju i na katu zgrade, a sastoji se od hodnika, kupaonice, stubišta, tehničke sobe/ostave, spavaće sobe i dnevnog boravka u suterenu, od hodnika, stubišta, kupaonice, dnevnog boravka, kuhinje i blagovaonice u prizemlju, te hodnika, dvije kupaonice i dvije spavaće sobe na katu kao posebnog dijela. Sporedni dio kuće u suterenu čini natkrivena terasa, u prizemlju natkrivena terasa i natkriveni ulaz, a na katu natkrivena terasa. Pripadak čine kućni vrt, vanjskog parking mjesto oznake P1, te pomoćna građevina bazen. Oprema kuće će biti prema zadnjim standardima, a papiri gradnje su uredni. Kupac ne plaća porez na promet nekretninama jer se prodavatelj nalazi u sustavu PDV-a. Predviđeni završetak je u 2025. godini. A beautiful semi-detached house with a swimming pool and a spacious garden for sale in Vodice with an attractive sea view. The house is located in an ideal and quiet location, close to the sea as well as the beautiful town of Tribunj. Independent usable unit – located in the basement, ground floor and first floor of the building, and consists of a hallway, bathroom, staircase, technical room/pantry, bedroom and living room in the basement, hallway, staircase, bathroom, living room, kitchen and dining room on the ground floor, and a hallway, two bathrooms and two bedrooms on the first floor as a separate part. The side part of the house in the basement consists of a covered terrace, on the ground floor a covered terrace and a covered entrance, and on the first floor a covered terrace. The property consists of a house garden, an outdoor parking space marked P1, and an auxiliary building swimming pool. The equipment of the house will be according to the latest standards, and the construction papers are in order. The buyer does not pay real estate transfer tax because the seller is in the VAT system. The expected completion is in 2025.
